title: Extent the Gilded Age economy fostered change

content.question: Evaluate the extent to which the Gilded Age economy fostered change in the United States in the period from 1870 to 1900.

frqParts.text: Evaluate the extent to which the Gilded Age economy fostered change in the United States in the period from 1870 to 1900.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
